name: meme-aggregator-monorepo
description: Monorepo root for Meme Coin Aggregation Service.

scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:full: npm run start:server & npm run start:worker
scripts.start:server: REDIS_URL=$REDIS_URL cd backend && npm run start
scripts.start:worker: REDIS_URL=$REDIS_URL cd backend && npm run worker
